channel.title: 508 problem help
channel.description:
Ok, i followed a tut on rune-s, i downloaded client, a server, changed jdk thing in all.bat, run.bat, all that stuff, and i downloaded the cache, put it in the C: disk drive, i run server then client, i put "0.0.0.0" in the ip box, then it stops loading the client on 'connecting to update server', please tell me what i am doing wrong.
I tryed using the 217.0.0.1 or whatever(ip) that someone told me to do, didnt work

item.title: 508 problem help
item.dc:creator: @Deamerrr Deamerrr
item.description:
@Deamerrr wrote:

@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

is the thing that was already in there.

Read full topic

item.title: 508 problem help
item.dc:creator: @Michaelmmm Michaelmmm
item.description:
@Michaelmmm wrote:

i got it to work, the trick that u need to do is, open the server folder and look for cmd and right click and “edit” run and look at the stuff,

u will see like

@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

delte “jre” or what ever it says; and replace it with “jdk”

so it looks like this:

@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

then click run and ur all set :), if stil ldonw work pm me on msn: envymike@live.com

Read full topic
